physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short stature (155 cm), shortened fourth and fifth fingers without fourth or fifth metacarpophalangeal knuckles bilaterally, symmetric abnormalities of both hands with shortening of the first and third distal phalanges and fourth and fifth metacarpals bilaterally. No ectopic calcifications on chest radiograph, serum calcium and phosphate were normal, intact parathyroid hormone (PTH) levels.
